#include <iostream>
#include <string>
#include <cstdio>
#include <cstdlib>
#include <cmath>
#include <algorithm>
#include <vector>
#include <stack>

using namespace std;
int main()
{
int t;
scanf("%d",&t);
while(t--)
{
    int n,m,c,mn=-999999;
    int v[100001]={0};
    scanf("%d%d%d",&n,&m,&c);
    for(int i=0;i<n;i++){
        scanf("%d",&v[i]);
    mn=max(v[i],mn);
    }
    int ans=-9999;
    for(int i=1;i<=mn;i++)
    {
        int loss=0,profit=0,ans2=0;
        for(int j=0;j<n;j++)
        {
            int cuts;
         if(v[j]>=i){
         if(v[j]%i==0)
         cuts=(v[j]/i)-1;
         else
         cuts=v[j]/i;;
         loss=cuts*c;
         profit=i*(v[j]/i)*m;
         if(profit-loss > 0)
          ans2+=profit-loss;
        }
        
    }
        ans=max(ans,ans2);
    }
    // cout<<ans<<endl;
    printf("%d\n",ans);
    
}
 

    return 0;
}
